thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Carl Grisdale

author: Carl Grisdale
title: Carl Grisdale
text: Spent over Â£65 to have flowers/gifts delivered to my mum in France for the Saturday before mothers day. They finally turned up today Monday late and after the event. To add to the insult I was then offered 20% of my next delivery. Do you really think I'm going to use your company again after the service and compensation you have offered me. I would not recommend this company to anyone unless you need to get flowers to someone after the event
